attributes.action: Drastically limit the number of EU and Non-EU citizens allowed to work and live in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The numbers [according to Government figures 1.1 million immigrants have entered Britain since 1997)project that the nature of British society will irrevocably and permanently be changed for our children and grandchildren. These fundamental changes are taking place without the public having a voice and  
the consequences for our society will be very serious indeed. See Migration Watch UK for the UK population projections.
